ing: 4 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, room temperature
des: "This dip is especially for all those football fans to consume while watching their favorite team win. Take it into a crowd, add chips--regular chips are best, but the ruffled style are good, too--and watch 'em eat it up. Before you know it, this dip will be gone."
ins: Place the cream cheese in a bowl. Using a fork, mash the cheese while gradually pouring in the milk to make a smooth mixture. Stir in garlic salt to taste.
